tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** **** ********** *** ********* ** *** ******* *** treatment is inimitable. Her focus is on the root cause of the disease not just the symptoms. She is very friendly and sensitive towards her patient. I went to her for simple ovarian cyst. She explained me everything related to it in detail and made sure that I'm comfortable. I had undergone laproscopic cystectomy under her guidance and i feel this was the best decision. She is very reliable and even her staff is very friendly and caring. I would suggest her for all the gynae related problems. Her way of treating patients is different and better than others.

review: Dr Disha is an amazing doctor who has immense knowledge on woman complications. She is a total expert in gynecology.both of my kids are born under her supervision and the after C-section healing advices are just beyond words.Also she is a great human being and really down to earth. She is a God sent angel for me and my kids.
